target: Do you want to buy tickets?
context: <user>  What time can I watch it at Opera Plaza? <system>  What is the name of the movie that you want to watch? Also, what date do you want to watch it? <user>  I want to watch Gloria Bell next Monday. <system>  Where are you located? <user>  Search in San Francisco. <system>  I found one showing at 9:30 pm at the Landmark's Opera Plaza Cinema. <user>  Sounds good. <system>
